item.title: Urine and Vomit, 28th July
item.description:
Need a good Jack Russ jet wash around this area urine smell and vomiting all over the floor and under fire exit need cleaning

item.title: Blocking parking with skip - no valid permit, 28th July
item.description:
These builders have persistently failed to get proper permits to remove the parking restrictions and have a skip on the road. For two weeks before they had a permit, they blocked the parking with bins and other rubbish. Now their permit is expired and the skip is still there. We pay for access to park on this street and this ongoing restriction is removing our access and often leaves us without spaces near our homes. This is unfair when other people on the street pay Â£1000s for parking restrictions to be removed + skip permits. They should be fined for a blatant disregard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Nutbrook Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The upper path East-side still needs to be cleared, 28th July
item.description:
See reports 6257231, 7440580, 7684505. The path has not been cleared at all, I don't see why you are putting it as fixed when it is not. I nearly tripped at one point and the brambles caught on my clothes. Previously I ha d to step into the bushes and get scratched to have a mother and two children squeeze by. This must affect the school children too.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodside Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Urgent: Slump in road, sinkhole forming outside 23 Hormead Road, 28th July
item.description:
Slump in road, sinkhole forming outside 23 Hormead Road. Pavement and road slumping further down, causing walls on neighbouring properties to crack and lean forward. Could be tree related but seems to be worsening and could be a serious issue

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Hormead Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet
